p: Gene Expression Profiling Interactive Analysis ( http://gepia.cancer-pku.cn/index.html) is an online database developed by scientists of Peking University, China [ 14]. To determine the expression of TUBA1C in LUAD tissues, we performed GEPIA and constructed boxplot, pathological stage plot, and survival curves, such as overall survival (OS) curve and disease-free survival (DFS) curve. Meanwhile, the relationship between TUBA1C and immune infiltrating cells was analyzed by GEPIA. The Spearman method was used to determine the correlation coefficient of the relationship.
